law.catch_line: // EFFECTIVE UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2013 PER CHAPTER 451 OF 2012 //...
law.text:
// EFFECTIVE UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2013 PER CHAPTER 451 OF 2012 //
This part applies only to individuals who:
are residents of Anne Arundel County; or
have an outstanding warrant from Anne Arundel County.
This part does not apply to an individual:
who is an active duty member of the armed forces of the United States; or
who files a joint Maryland income tax return.
